name: T_set_min
description: Required minimum indoor temperature (for heating load calculation)

name: T_set_min_night
description: Required minimum indoor temperature at night (for heating load calculation)

name: T_set_min_free_day
description: Minimum required indoor temperature on a non-working day in a non-residential building (for heating load calculations)

name: T_set_max
description: Required maximum indoor temperature (for cooling load calculation)

name: T_set_max_night
description: Required maximum indoor temperature at night (for cooling load calculation)

name: T_bivalent
description: Dual mode temperature (for heat pump design)

name: buildings_short
description: Abbreviations of the selectable building types.

name: buildings_long
description: Names of the selectable building types.

name: retrofit_short
description: Abbreviations of the retrofit levels of the residential buildings

name: retrofit_long
description: Names of the retrofit levels of the residential buildings.

name: retrofit_short_non_residential
description: Abbreviations of the retrofit levels of the non residential buildings.

name: retrofit_long_non_residential
description: Names of the retrofit levels of the non residential buildings.

name: construction_type_short
description: Abbreviations of the construction types of the non residential buildings.

name: construction_type_long
description: Names of the construction types of the non residential buildings.

name: dhwload
description: Maximal power for domestic hot water for each flat in the building types SFH, MFH, TH, and AB, and for each main room in the building types OB, School, and Store.

name: mean_drawoff_vol_per_day
description: Mean drawoff DHW volume per day and person for each building type (SFH, MFH, TH, AB, OB, School, Store). Source: 12831-3/A100 Table NA.4 for residential buildings and SIA2024 for non-residential buidlings (with some adjustments to approach the real values
